entities.description: Needing a lot more hallucinogens to get the feeling you want.
Using the same amount of hallucinogens has much less effect than it used to.
Attempting to cut down or stop using hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
Unable to cut down or stop hallucinogen usage more than one time in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent needed a lot more hallucinogens to get the desired feeling.
Indicates if the respondent feels that the same amount of hallucinogens has much less effect than it used to.
Indicates if the respondent has tried to cut down or stop using hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent has been unable to cut down or stop using hallucinogens more than one time in the past 12 months.
